dcterms:description: MIMIC-CXR is a valuable subset of MIMIC specifically focusing on chest X-ray images. This publicly available resource provides a rich dataset for researchers in medical image analysis, containing 377,110 de-identified chest radiographs, including both frontal and lateral views captured during patientsâ€™ hospital admissions.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-CXR

dcterms:description: MIMIC-IV is a freely accessible electronic health record dataset that incorporates data from patients admitted between the years 2008 and 2019. It includes comprehensive information such as patient demographics, diagnoses, procedures, medications, laboratory measurements, and vital signs.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-IV

dcterms:creator: Nasir Hayat
Krzysztof J Geras
Farah E Shamout
dcterms:description: MedFuse is a framework for multi-modal fusion with clinical time-series data and chest X-ray images, designed to improve in-hospital mortality prediction and phenotype classification tasks.
dcterms:title: MedFuse
